meanings.definition: A posture assumed in hatha yoga.
meanings.sent1: During yoga class, I practiced a new asana to improve my flexibility.
meanings.sent2: The instructor demonstrated the asana for us to follow along.
meanings.sent3: Trying to do the asana with my eyes closed led to a wobbly balance.
meanings.sent4: The asana felt like a graceful dance, flowing from one position to another.
meanings.sent5: The challenging asana made me feel accomplished when I finally mastered it.

meanings.definition: A sitting posture used for meditation.
meanings.sent1: In the peaceful garden, I found a comfortable asana to meditate in.
meanings.sent2: The wise monk sat in a serene asana, deep in meditation.
meanings.sent3: Trying to maintain the asana while giggling quietly was quite a challenge.
meanings.sent4: The asana felt like a sturdy foundation for my wandering thoughts.
meanings.sent5: The chosen asana helped me focus my mind and find inner peace.

meanings.sent1: The advanced yoga class introduced a challenging asana for us to try.
meanings.sent2: I practiced the asana daily to improve my strength and balance.
meanings.sent3: Attempting the asana with a playful twist added a fun element to the practice.
meanings.sent4: The asana resembled a graceful sculpture, each movement deliberate and precise.
meanings.sent5: The asana required focus and determination to hold the position steadily.
